summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city street. A motorcyclist is ahead, moving in the same direction. The motorcyclist is gradually moving towards the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed, keeping a safe distance from the motorcyclist ahead. The vehicle is staying in its lane and not making any sudden movements.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 20 meters away, moving towards the right side of the road.

characters: Driver of a white SUV, driver of a red truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road approaching a traffic light. A white SUV is ahead in the same lane, and a red truck is in the adjacent right lane. The red truck is moving forward and appears to be accelerating.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching the traffic light. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the white SUV ahead and monitoring the red truck in the adjacent lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white SUV, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Right: A red truck, approximately 5 meters away, accelerating and moving forward.
